ygData.subject: Re: Sacrement icon and ingot?
ygData.msgSnippet: uhm, actually, some may require more....they goofed the txt files that tell you about the quests......the constant (which gives the bp btw) says 3 bars, but it
ygData.messageBody:
uhm, actually, some may require more....they goofed the txt files that tell you
about the quests......the constant (which gives the bp btw) says 3 bars, but it
takes 4....and the penitent (which is the legs <so i've heard>) takes 3 instead
of 2.....so you're looking at more than likely 20+ bars.....definitely if you
get the sacrament ones.....and then the spawn times are outrageous.....

ok enough of my rantings for now
(\/)ystix

Paul Heenan wrote:

> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>

> 7 pieces of armor, 3 require 3 bars, 4 require 2 bars = 17 enchanted bars *
> 125pp = Ouch!
